name: BanMessage
short: Send message on ban in a chosen channel. Supports images!
description: Send message on ban in a chosen channel. Supports images!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing BanMessage. If anything doesn't work, you can report it on my issue tracker at <https://github.com/Jackenmen/JackCogs/issues>.

This cog saves images set with `[p]banmessageset setimage` to data path.
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
